verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> when he fled <S%H1272><s%> from Absalom <S%H53><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%> Lord, <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> are they increased <S%H7231><s%> that trouble <S%H6862><s%> me! many <S%H7227><s%> are they that rise <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> me.
Many <S%H7227><s%> there be which say <S%H559><s%> of my soul, <S%H5315><s%> There is no <S%H369><s%> help <S%H3444><s%> for him in God. <S%H430><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> are a shield <S%H4043><s%> for me; my glory, <S%H3519><s%> and the lifter <S%H7311><s%> up of my head. <S%H7218><s%>
I cried <S%H7121><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill. <S%H2022><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
I laid <S%H7901><s%> me down <S%H7901><s%> and slept; <S%H3462><s%> I awaked; <S%H6974><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sustained <S%H5564><s%> me.
I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H7233><s%> of people, <S%H5971><s%> that have set <S%H7896><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> me round <S%H5439><s%> about.

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me, O my God: <S%H430><s%> for you have smitten <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my enemies <S%H341><s%> on the cheek <S%H3895><s%> bone; you have broken <S%H7665><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of the ungodly. <S%H7563><s%>
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongs to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> your blessing <S%H1293><s%> is on your people. <S%H5971><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
